title: Converse - Wall To Wall: Beirut
description:
Hady Beydoun is a Lebanese tattoo artist, graphic designer, airbrush illustrator, sculptor, and painter. Putting ink to skin for the first time on January 20th 1995, Hady brought the tattoo to Beirut. In the decade and a half since, Hady has single-handedly been responsible for popularizing the art form in a region where it has traditionally been considered taboo. 

Check him out in Beirut as he takes our Wall to Wall series to his home town in Lebanon, along the green line that once separated East Beirut from West Beirut.

Music: "Ridin'" by Lazzy Lung.

For more on the Wall to Wall series, visit converse.com/walltowall.
